name: spo-sharepoint-alerts-audit
title: SharePoint Online - Export SharePoint Alerts
shortDescription: Audit classic SharePoint alerts across all site collections.
longDescription: Scan SharePoint Online sites, collect classic alerts configured by users, and export the results for migration planning.
